tossup_question: -   –  At his latest basketball game, LeBron attempted only 3-pointers and 2-pointers. He was successful on 20% of his 3 pointers and 30% of his 2-pointers. If LeBron attempted 30 shots, how many points did he score?
bonus_question: -  15)  – 	What is the value of the infinite expression 2 times the square root of 2 times
